lead_paragraph: For safety reasons amid Baltimore’s unrest, the Orioles and White Sox played what was believed to be the first major league game without spectators on Wednesday afternoon.

headline.print_headline: Empty Seats in a Game Full of Meaning for Baltimore
headline.main: Orioles Play in Eerily Empty Stadium, Sirens in Distance

snippet: For safety reasons amid Baltimore’s unrest, the Orioles and White Sox played what was believed to be the first major league game without spectators on Wednesday afternoon.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat Chicago White Sox, 8-2, in what is believed to be first major league game played without spectators; public is locked out from game for safety reasons amid Baltimore unrest.
